trans-unit.source: Represents the information needed by an event handler to perform custom processing whenever the contents of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Representa as informações necessárias para um manipulador de eventos realizar o processamento personalizado sempre que o conteúdo de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" /> mudar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the change within the subject <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice da alteração na <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" /> de assunto.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém cada <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> removido.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém cada <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> corresponding to the event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> correspondente ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the change within the subject <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice da alteração na <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" /> de assunto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> which was removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que foi removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> which was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> corresponding to the event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> correspondente ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> representing the type of change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> que representa o tipo de alteração que ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> representing the type of change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> que representa o tipo de alteração que ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém cada <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionado.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém cada <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the change originating the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da alteração originando o evento.

trans-unit.source: The index of the change originating the event.
trans-unit.target: O índice da alteração de origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém cada <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> removido.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipado do tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém cada <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> removido.
